channel.title: CVE Feed for JetBrains -- Hub
channel.description: The latest CVEs for JetBrains -- Hub

item.title: CVE-2022-48429|2024-08-03T15:10:59.907Z -- jetbrains -- hub
item.description: In JetBrains Hub before 2022.3.15573, 2022.2.15572, 2022.1.15583 reflected XSS in dashboards was possible

item.title: CVE-2022-48477|2024-08-03T15:17:54.682Z -- jetbrains -- hub
item.description: In JetBrains Hub before 2023.1.15725 SSRF protection in Auth Module integration was missing

item.title: CVE-2022-45471|2024-08-03T14:17:03.296Z -- jetbrains -- hub
item.description: In JetBrains Hub before 2022.3.15181 Throttling was missed when sending emails to a particular email address

item.title: CVE-2022-34894|2024-08-03T09:22:10.639Z -- jetbrains -- hub
item.description: In JetBrains Hub before 2022.2.14799, insufficient access control allowed the hijacking of untrusted services

item.title: CVE-2022-29811|2024-08-03T06:33:42.797Z -- jetbrains -- hub
item.description: In JetBrains Hub before 2022.1.14638 stored XSS via project icon was possible.

item.description: In JetBrains Hub before 2024.2.34646 stored XSS via project description was possible
